    • action

      public Pokemon action​(Capacity c, Pokemon p_attack, Pokemon p_defend)
      Manage damages caused by a capacity on a pokemon
      Parameters:
      Capacity - "c", Pokemon "p_attack" the pokemon which attacks, Pokemon "p_defend" the pokemon attacked
      Returns:
      Pokemon p_defend with the hp he got left after being attacked

    • oneshot

      public Pokemon oneshot​(Pokemon p_defend)
      Method for dev purposes only, allow to one shot the opponent pokemon
      Parameters:
      Pokemon - "p_defend" the pokemon attacked
      Returns:
      Pokemon p_defend with the hp he got left after being attacked
